transcript:
Customer: Hello?
(silence)
Hello?
(silence)
Hello?
Customer: Hello Gurvinder ji se baat ho rahi hai?
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Gurvinder ji main Richa baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART Noida head office se, kaise hain sir?
Executive: Theek hai madam.
Customer: Haan ji. So sir aapka ek ye complaint aaya hua tha that you are not getting relevant leads, right sir?
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Haan to matlab aap aap par Vishal sir discussion chal raha tha, unhone ye bataya ki you are looking leads only from Punjab ki sirf Punjab se lead chahiye wo bhi bulk quantity mein chahiye.
Customer: Mujhe to yahi bola gaya tha madam jab service bechi thi aapne.
Executive: Haan. Okay. To sir jo bhi aap lead consume kar rahe hain, jaise almost abhi do mahine ho gaye aapke service live mein. To jitni bhi aapne lead consume kari October mein aapne 42 lead li, November mein abhi tak sir aap 37 lead consume kar chuke hain. To kya feedback hai like are you finding these leads relevant sir? Kyunki lead consume kar rahe hain to matlab hmm.
Customer: Madam mere paas na jo bulk ki leads hai na wo sold out show ho rahi hai.
Customer: Aapke concern officer ne ye bola tha ki aap lead consume karte rahe dhire dhire aap upgrade hote rahoge system se to aapko bulk ki quantity aani shuru ho jayegi. To main isliye.
Executive: Kya bola tha sir aapko dobara boliye?
Customer: Matlab aap jo bhi leads hai na consume kariye aap.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Aur consume karne ke baad aapko bulk ki ye show honi shuru ho jayegi. Main isliye consume kar raha tha.
Executive: Sir jis product ki aap lead consume karte hain na matlab ye pura aapka check karte hain na aap jis product ki lead consume karenge jis location ki karenge wahi period aapko milega, hai na sir?
Customer: Haan to bulk ki nahi na aa rahi, wo to chhoti chhoti quantity ki aa rahi hai, koi 10 hai, koi 20 hai, koi 50.
Customer: Bulk ki to mujhe sold out show ho rahi hai.
Executive: Bulk ki sold out show ho rahi hai aapko?
Customer: Haan wo bol rahe ji paanch aadmi ko hum provide kar sakte hain isse jyada nahi kar sakte. Main kaha ji meri service band kar do. Main paanch aadmi nahi aata to phir fayda kya hai mujhe? Maine to business enhance karne ke liye aapki ye service li hai agar business enhance nahi hoga to fayda kya hai.
Executive: To sir dekhiye lead to agar main dekhu aapki to sir aap mujhe minimum order quantity batayenge jaise LED panel light ka abhi ek 10 piece ka requirement hai wo Jalandhar se requirement hai.
Customer: 10 piece ka nahi nahi 10 piece hum utha nahi sakte isko.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Wo wo retail hai na, hum chahiye wholesaler customer. Wo to retail hai, retail hum karte hi nahi hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm. Ye cheez hai.
Executive: To minimum kitna sir order hona chahiye sir?
Customer: Order jaise koi wholesaler hai wo 200, 500, 3000 piece mangwata hai wholesaler.
Executive: 200, 500 piece ka.
Customer: Haan 100, 200, 500 wo to pata kya baat hai ji hum aise nahi gin lete hum pehle uski koi jaise GST ho matlab aap jo bhi green tick mark kiye hote hain na tabhi lete hain. Retail wale to hum wo lete hi nahi hum to waise to retail mein hum deal hi nahi karte na hi hum service provide kar sakte hain isko. Retail wale ko to retail wale ko to rate ka idea lena hota hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Isliye wo wo to isliye aapke platform pe aa jata hai.
Executive: Sir jaise na abhi main ye dekh pa rahi hu ki jo ek na STO2 karke ek product hai aapka. Ye karte hain sir aap?
Customer: Haan sure.
Executive: Ab isme na 50 kg ki requirement hai.
Customer: Wo wo wo nahi bechte na hum. 50 kg wala to bechte nahi hum to burden ke hisab se bechte hain. Wo raw material hai, raw material hum provide nahi na karte. Na hi humne ye category mein.
Executive: Puraani hai sir ye, GST verified hai, do din puraana lead hai sir ye.
Customer: Ye to pata hai mujhe wo hum maangta kya hai par karan ye hai na hum usko deal hi nahi kar sakte. Ab hamare paas wo hai hi nahi system uska.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: Hamare paas to finished finished goods ka kaam hai. Wo raw material hai 50 kilo wala.
Executive: Theek hai. Sir agar main abhi at present Punjab ka hi dekhu na ya thoda nearby mein bhi karenge sir?
Customer: Haan Punjab nearby jaise maan lijiye J&K hai wo Himachal hai.
Executive: Kiski hai sir?
Customer: J&K hai, Himachal hai. Ye Punjab nearby.
Executive: Nearby state bhi kar lenge na sir aap?
Customer: Haan haan bilkul sure.
Executive: Achha. But at present sir mere paas matlab itna nahi hai lead kuch jaise 20 piece, 10 piece ka hi lead hai agar main nearby.
Customer: Haan nahi wahi to baat hai na aap aap meri system mein jaake dekho paanch minute mein kitni quantity ki leads hai wo sold out hai.
Customer: Kal hi maine jis samay service bechi thi madam ko maine screenshot maine mere haath mein tha, maine online tha.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Aur online mein bhi wo system mein mere hai hi nahi sold out mein aa raha hai past mein aa raha hai.
Customer: Aur usi time maine screenshot leke send bhi kar diya ye dekho service.
Executive: Haan. Sir ya to matlab bahut sare multiple products hain jaise lights bhi hain scrubbers hain to sir matlab you are a ye retailer na sir aapke.
Customer: Scrubbers ki to waise hi kam aati hai LED flood lights ki jyada aati hai. Wahi wahi hum deal karte hain jyada.
Executive: Retailer hai na sir aap?
Customer: Wholesaler hai, wholesaler hai.
Executive: Wholesaler. Haan ji haan ji.
Executive: Theek hai sir. To abhi kya karna hai sir dekhiye as of now itna hi lead hai sir apne paas aap mujhe bataiye sir agar koi requirement aayegi to aapko show ho hi jayegi.
Customer: Nahi wo aap system theek karo nahi ho sakta to band kar do service.
Executive: Abhi to do mahine hi hue hai dedh do mahine complete hue hai.
Customer: Do mahine se sir nahi mil raha na sir aapko response.
Customer: Ab suniye ji aisa hai company act ke according aap refund karoge.
Executive: Kya bol rahe hain sir?
Customer: Company act mein quarter teen mahine ke andar andar aapko koi bhi service kharab pasand aaye koi product pasand na aaye to aapko uska jo bhi isme aapne refund karna padega. Agar teen mahine se kuch nahi kar sakta isliye main aapko bol bol raha hu ki agar service band kara ke aapka paisa refund kara do sir.
Executive: Main main service band kara ke aapka paisa refund kara du sir?
Customer: Haan yahi karo.
Customer: Par mujhe bada bada mujhe bahut pareshani hogi matlab main aapke IndiaMART se tootna hua side pe ja raha hu.
Executive: Kya sir?
Customer: Main kaha agar main IndiaMART se toot raha hu na to mujhe bahut pareshani hogi par service nahi ho rahi sahi to mere mujhe meri majboori hai. I am helpless.
Executive: Theek hai sir aap sahi bol rahe ho.
Executive: Ab maine aapko dikha di aur do mahine aapne service use kari. Theek hai sir aur uske bavajud bhi agar aap satisfied nahi hai koi order nahi hai lead nahi hai aapke according to phir matlab theek hai aap jo decision le rahe hain kyunki dekhiye aapne jo complaint dali bahut time se matlab seven days se main khud isko hold kare hue hu. Main un logo ke sath bhi discussion nahi hua main dekh rahi hu kisi tarah se aapko lead mil jaye. Par jo bhi available lead hai sir maine sab aapke sath discuss kari and you are not finding even a single lead relevant for you.
Customer: Yes yes yes.
Executive: To main band kara deti hu sir aapki service kyunki aage jaake phir matlab do mahine ho gaye aage jaake phir aap mere ko complaint karoge usi cheez ke liye.
Customer: Bilkul bilkul haan ji haan ji sure.
Executive: Theek hai sir. To dekhiye jo service aapka chal chuka hai sir do month ka wo paisa aapka deduct ho jayega aur balance amount main aapko return kara dungi.
Customer: Kitna banega?
Executive: Sir aap dekhiye jitna aapne diya tha IndiaMART ko divide by 12 kar lijiye sir. To wo usi tarike se aapka one month ka deduct ho jayega monthly basis.
Customer: With jo maine GST paid kiya tha GST kat ke milega ke GST including milega?
Executive: GST ka to aap rebate le chuke hain na sir.
Customer: Haan wo to GST ke alawa usko balance karke divide by 12 karo multiply 100 karo.
Executive: Haan sir ye ek baar na iski calculation aapko Vishal bata denge maximum ya to evening tak ya kal kal tak, theek hai sir?
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Chaliye theek hai sir theek hai thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not getting relevant leads as promised.

- Bulk leads showing as sold out.

- Wants leads from Punjab in bulk quantity.

- Wants refund if the issue is not resolved.



Resolution:

- Executive acknowledged the customer's concerns.

- Explained lead availability and consumption.

- Agreed to close the service and process refund.

- Calculation of refund amount to be shared.



Next Steps: 

- Calculation of refund amount to be shared by Vishal.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, refund, subscription, cancellation
